it.polimi.ingsw.GameModel.Board.Player.Table
All Implemented Interfaces:
PlaceAndRemoveStudent, Serializable
public class Table extends StudentContainer
Class that models a single table of a single color that can only host students of said color.

    • placeStudent

      public boolean placeStudent(Student student) throws FullTableException, IllegalArgumentException
      Checks if the owner of the table is rewarded with a coin
      Parameters:
      student - to place in the table
      Returns:
      true if a coin is to be awarded
      Throws:
      FullTableException - if the table cannot accept any more students
      IllegalArgumentException - if the color of the student is not correct for the table (should never happen)
